Reference version 0.0.0.9000

All functions

coordinate_example

Example data.frame with species name column

df_factors_to_char

Convert all factors of a dataframe to characters

download_knmi_data_hour

Download KNMI hourly data to file

gbif_species_name_match

Add species information provided by the GBIF taxonomic backbone API

guess_projection

Take a dataset and plot in different projections on a leaflet map to check the expected projection

mow_header_split

Get data entry from MOW header data file

plot_coordinates_on_map

plot x/y coordinates on a map, from given projection

plot_label_splitter

Split a long (plot) label into a two-liner

rain_knmi_2012

Example data.frame with KNMI downloaded data

read_kmi_data

Load KMI data as data.frame

read_knmi_rainfall

Read KNMI rainfall datafile as data.frame

read_mow_data

Read MOW data

reproject_coordinates

reproject XY coordinates from dframe columns

species_example

Example data.frame with species name column

vif

Variance inflation factor
